author: Kevin Goddard
title: August Alsina - Wait
text:
0 MAKE IT STOP August Alsina drops off a new single called "Wait." 
Having been M.I.A for the most part of 2016, August Alsina returned to the music scene last week with the release of his new single “ Drugs ,” which he later confirmed was the title track to his forthcoming album. Well just a day after hitting us with the official video for “Drugs ,” the N.O. Crooner decides to waste little time in sharing its follow up single called “Wait.” 
No word yet is this will see life on the album or not, but considering it's an Apple Music release the chances are highly likely. Hit play and let us know what you think of the sultry R&B ballad. (Single available on iTunes ) 
Quotable Lyrics: 
Don't think for a minute that I'm a foolDon't know what I'll do if I lose youYou need someone who will be there to hold youI can't even say that it's fair, but I doHoping I will always be here if you need meWhat I gotta say isn't easy 
- August
